Pasireotide is an investigational multireceptor targeting somatostatin analog ( SSA ) that binds with high affinity to four of the five somatostatin receptor subtypes ( sst 1 , 2 , 3 and 5)(5 ) .
Pasireotide ( SOM230 ) .It is a somatostatin receptor ( SSR ) ligand with high binding affinity for multiple receptor isoforms ( SST1 - 3 and SST5 ) .
